overview: A spectacular performance filled with the passion and energy of the members of the star troupe led by top star Makoto Rei! The first act is a unique Takarazuka Revue show featuring famous songs from many works performed by the Star Troupe. The second act will consist of pops, rock, and musical numbers, and will showcase the charm of Makoto Rei, who is not confined to the boundaries of the Takarazuka Revue.
title: VERDAD!!－真実の音－
